revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Actiontec MI424WR.gif |image1_size = 150px |caption = Verizon Fios Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Actiontec_MI424WR_rev_D |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Actiontec |model = MI424WR |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Rev D |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/22/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Actiontec_MI424WR_vD |wlclass = G54 |series = MI424WR |type = wireless router,FiOS modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = LNQ802MAG |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP420;PRIXP420ABD; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- 266 / 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F640J3D-75; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V281620FTP-H; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Micrel;KSZ8995MA; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames --> |ethoui = 00:1F:90, 00:18:01 |oui = 00:1F:90, 00:18:01
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RGLoader;;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.21;Jungo OpenRG;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J20 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin unpopulated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = ''unit's serial number'' |defaultssid = XXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, LEDE Project, OpenWrt,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/24/2006 |estreldate = 08/20/2007 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Actiontec 802MAG |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2413; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The CPU is part [[Intel XScale]] IXP420 (PRIXP420ABD @533MHz). There are no heatsinks installed on this unit.
The device uses two ''Entropic Comm.'' EN2210 for the coaxial ([http://www.mocalliance.org/ MoCA]) connections. [http://www.mocalliance.org/industry/certificates/MIC018%20-%20Actiontec.pdf MoCA 1.0 certification, 08/20/2007] (presumed to be close [or closer than the FCC approval date for the wireless module, anyway] to the release date)
The default SSID follows a pattern of 5 letters and numbers (example: '''34M42''').
==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/mi424wr ''Actiontec MI424WR'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/MI424WR ''Actiontec MI424WR'' on the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=145115 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (internal shots) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=23514 ''Actiontec MI424WR'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.avsforum.com/avs-vb/showthread.php?t=1145636 ''Actiontec MI424WR'' on the '''AVS''' forums]

==Notes== ===PSU=== The power adapter included with the device is a '''[[Actiontec]]''' ADS6818-1505-WDB 0530 (5VDC, 3A, 15W)
